resources.string: The home button shows you the stories posted by users in chronological order. You can like the stories, view them in detail and share with your friends!
The search view allows you to look for users by their username and view stories posted by them. You can like the stories, view them in detail and share with your friends!
The profile view shows you the stories posted by you in a grid format. You can view and delete your stories in this view!
The add view allows you to post new stories. You can add an image, an optional video, a caption and a longer story.
